hanzi-su-wiki:
偵

Значения

Разведывать, высматривать

Мнемоника

Раб подсматривает, как оракулу приносят деньги 貝 за гадание 卜, и хочет научиться его ремеслу.

Варианты

侦

to scout; to spy; to detect
разведывать; шпионить; обнаружить

(Simplified: 侦)
Pictophonetic: 貞 indicates the sound; 亻 (person) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
偵查 [ zhēn chá ]: to detect; to investigate
偵察 [ zhēn chá ]: to investigate a crime; to scout; to reconnoiter; reconnaissance; detection; a scout
偵破 [ zhēn pò ]: to investigate (as detective); to solve (crime); to uncover (a plot); to sniff out; to break in and analyze; detective work; to scout
偵探 [ zhēn tàn ]: detective; to do detective work
偵察機 [ zhēn chá jī ]: surveillance aircraft; spy plane

• ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 貞 [ zhēn ] virtuous, chaste, pure; loyal
heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T is a terrible spy. He walks around upright. "Why should I hide from being detected?! I've got nothing to be ashamed of!".
heisig_constituent: spy, person, upright, magic wand, augury, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: Mr. T is a terrible spy. He walks around upright. "Why should I hide?! I´ve got nothing to be ashamed of!".
koohiiStory2: NOTE: The second primitive is upright, not eminent. There is an error in the book.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your leader sticks his toe into a shellfish. You ask him why and he says he wants to spy on it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: There’s a hidden camera on his toe and the leader wants to have plenty of secret spy footage to review later.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You and the leader review the spy footage and find a single tater (てい) tot hidden within the shellfish. Together you uncover a huge smuggling ring. Clams, oysters, muscles, you name it! Shellfish of all kinds are using their bodies to sneak tater tots to the undersea world.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: If it wasn't for your toe spy network, these egregious tater tot crimes would have never reached the light of day.
Ru_Radicals: 化 (превращаться), ハ, 卜 (гадание), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the upright (貞) man (亻) is a spy
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When a chaste woman is a victim of a crime Mr. T likes to play detective and detect the heck out of that fool!
humanum_full_description_en:
From " people " to " zheng " sound. " Detective " is the same as " Zhen ", which means Zhen asked. "Shu Wen Xin Fu": "Detection, Question Ye. From the person, Zhen Sheng." "Book of Rites. "Chen Yi": "The Yi said: "Don't persevere its virtue, or inherit the shame. Persevere its morality, the woman is lucky, the master is fierce."" Zheng Xuan's note: "Detection, ask also. Asking right is investigating." Lu Deming Interpretation: "Detective, "Zhouyi" as Zhen."

" Detective " also means secret investigation . "Jade articles. "Human Ministry": "Detection, waiting also." Such as "Hou Han Shu. "The Biography of Wuhuan Xianbei": "The road ahead is dangerous, and the thieves are difficult to measure. It is advisable to close the camp and scout Qingqi." "New Tang Book. "Li Deyu Biography": "The controversial person can say that all soldiers can stop. The emperor sent the middle man Ma Yuan to be like Taiyuan to investigate his changes."
humanum_short_description_en: From " people " to " zheng " sound. " Detective " is the same as " Zhen ", which means zhen to ask; it also means secret investigation .
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「貞」聲。「偵」同「貞」，表示貞問。《說文新附》：「偵，問也。从人，貞聲。」《禮記．緇衣》：「《易》曰：『不恒其德，或承之羞。恒其德偵，婦人吉，夫子凶。』」鄭玄注：「偵，問也。問正為偵。」陸德明釋文：「偵，《周易》作貞。」

　　「偵」又表示暗中探察。《玉篇．人部》：「偵，候也。」如《後漢書．烏桓鮮卑列傳》：「前道險阻，賊埶難量，宜且結營，先令輕騎偵視之。」《新唐書．李德裕傳》：「議者頗言兵皆可罷。帝遣中人馬元實如太原，偵其變。」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，「貞」聲。「偵」同「貞」，表示貞問；又表示暗中探察。

偵破 [ zhēn pò ]: to investigate (as detective); to solve (crime); to uncover (a plot); to sniff out; to break in and analyze; detective work; to scout
偵探 [ zhēn tàn ]: detective; to do detective work
偵察機 [ zhēn chá jī ]: surveillance aircraft; spy plane

Asking right is investigating." Lu Deming Interpretation: "Detective, "Zhouyi" as Zhen." " Detective" also means secret investigation. "Jade articles. "Human Ministry": "Detection, waiting also." 偵字的基本解释

偵
zhēn
见“侦”。

偵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhēn］
［《廣韻》丑貞切，平清，徹。］
［《廣韻》丑鄭切，去勁，徹。］
［《廣韻》猪孟切，去映，知。］
“侦1”的繁体字。亦作“遉1”。
(1)问，卜问。
(2)暗中察看、测度。

偵字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　偵； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页111第35
【廣韻】丑貞切【集韻】【韻會】癡貞切【正韻】丑成切，?音檉。?也，探伺也。【杜預·左傳註】諜者曰游偵，亦謂之閒諜。【後漢·淸河孝王傳】內使御者，偵伺得失。【循吏任延傳】止罷偵候戍卒。　一作?。【鶡冠子·王鈇篇】?諜足以相止。【註】?偵同。

偵字的源字形

暂无。

zhēn
вм. 侦
Radicals: ｲ, ト, 貝  (leader, toe, shellfish)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your leader sticks his toe into a shellfish. You ask him why and he says he wants to spy on it.
There’s a hidden camera on his toe and the leader wants to have plenty of secret spy footage to review later.
Reading Mnemonic
You and the leader review the spy footage and find a single tater (てい) tot hidden within the shellfish. Together you uncover a huge smuggling ring. Clams, oysters, muscles, you name it! Shellfish of all kinds are using their bodies to sneak tater tots to the undersea world.
If it wasn't for your toe spy network, these egregious tater tot crimes would have never reached the light of day.
